fields.Title: YARD / FOOTPRINTS VISCAL
fields.Description: Easy perception shows prints. Then a medium VISUAL CALCULUS reveals a numbered scheme of footprints. Interaction with the scheme lets you deduce how many vigilantes there were at the hanging, when it happened etc.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, there are eight.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, there are eight."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe it was a giant?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it was a giant?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do I think?" He tilts his hea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do I think?" He tilts his head. "A mob of people brought someone to the tree. Not by dragging -- probably by carrying him."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "2) Standard work boot, steel reinfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 2) Standard work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 44. Either the blond muscular guy, Glen, or the young guy with a plectrum around his neck.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You're not bad. It's as if the whol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're not bad. It's as if the whole world darkens -- and the tracks burn in it with strange beauty.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Maybe the carrier wanted to impress..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe the carrier wanted to impress his peers... demonstrate his physical might?

fields.Title: You: ""Those jerks? Definitely.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those jerks? Definitely."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "2) Standard work boot, steel reinfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 2) Standard work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 44.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "3) Hobnailed work boot, steel reinf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 3) Hobnailed work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 43.

fields.Title: You: "Count more."
fields.Dialogue Text: Count more.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Impossible to tell. Could also have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Impossible to tell. Could also have been an adolescent. The gait is undeveloped.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do." The lieutenant marks someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do." The lieutenant marks something in his notebook. "One of them carried him over."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Never again, Mr. Costeau. Everyone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Never again, Mr. Costeau. Everyone knows what your name is -- Raphaël A. Costeau. From here on it's what they will call you.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You and him are on the same page no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You and him are on the same page now -- about The Law and being it. This has affected your relationship positively.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "It's bad. Very bad. Before you can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's bad. Very bad. Before you can heave the wind changes direction again, the greenhouse plastic flapping in it's gust.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "REGARDEZ LA RETARD! He wants to hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: REGARDEZ LA RETARD! He wants to have fun *without* alcohol. That won't be fun, that'll be boring and sad.

fields.Title: You: ""We should just generally withhold..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should just generally withhold being content. With life. It's a philosophical disposition we should have."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It does." He looks around. "I shou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It does." He looks around. "I shouldn't have assumed in the first place. The caller could have lied, the whole thing could be misreported. Should we take another look? Or go?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, well." The lieutenant thinks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, well." The lieutenant thinks for a moment. "He *did* look a bit like a rat, you're right. Do you think those prints belong to him?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He makes a note in his blue binder:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He makes a note in his blue binder: "Is there anything else that's noteworthy here?"

fields.Title: You: "I'm pretty good at this, ain't I?"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm pretty good at this, ain't I?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "4) Standard work boot, no 45 or 46...."
fields.Dialogue Text: 4) Standard work boot, no 45 or 46... Theo, the old smoker. You think you even see a tiny fleck of cigarette ash inside the print...

fields.Title: You: ""A *driver* would wear down their r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A *driver* would wear down their right shoe before the left -- the accelerator is on the right. And remember that abandoned lorry cabin we found?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Wow. Still not doing it. You're *ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow. Still not doing it. You're *bad* at this.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So far so good -- only one thing m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So far so good -- only one thing missing." He looks at the tracks, face lighting up from the realization.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interesting -- let's name it the O..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interesting -- let's name it the Odd-Sole."
fields.Alternate1: "Interesting. Let's name it the Odd-Sole. I wouldn't be surprised if this was the missing Hardie boy... wonder who he is?"

fields.Title: Logic: "But why?"
fields.Dialogue Text: But why?

fields.Title: You: ""I was thinking it was the Giant of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was thinking it was the Giant of Koko Nur."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." He takes his glasses off and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm." He takes his glasses off and cleans them.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The case is not solved," he says w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The case is not solved," he says without a speck of laughter. "However."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Prudent.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Prudent."

fields.Title: Volition: "Isn't it strange to have your assum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Isn't it strange to have your assumptions confirmed like this? This is what someone whispering *suggestions* in your ear would like you to feel.

fields.Title: You: ""I think we have a firm understandi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we have a firm understanding of what happened here."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps it could be a *driver*? A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps it could be a *driver*? A driver would wear out their right shoe before the left. The accelerator is on the right."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I could still be wrong, but... I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could still be wrong, but... I'm probably not."

fields.Title: You: ""I think the entire Union is involv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think the entire Union is involved. Maybe even all of Martinaise..." (Look around suspiciously.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, well..." He quickly disregard..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, well..." He quickly disregards your statement as another one of your outbursts.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should see what Titus Hardie ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should see what Titus Hardie has got to say on the matter -- this might throw them off, work in our advantage..." He writes something down into his little notebook. "So, what else?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Sitting at a desk, Lieutenant Kitsu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sitting at a desk, Lieutenant Kitsuragi fiddles with a pen, then writes something on the paper in front of him. He shouldn't be doing that, he should be here discussing the footprints.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "6) An aberration -- light as air. E..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 6) An aberration -- light as air. Even pace. Same make of boot, but no 41.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A woman or a kid?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A woman or a kid?"

fields.Title: You: "Point at the pine tree."
fields.Dialogue Text: Point at the pine tree.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Beneath the mirthless exterior the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beneath the mirthless exterior the lieutenant is amused. Although he does not actually think you blew it wide open.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "There are eight pairs of tracks in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are eight pairs of tracks in the mud. Three stick out, but...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He appears to be wearing some kind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He appears to be wearing some kind of armoured boots. I can't see any exotic prints here..." His face muscles twitch. "Someone had to carry him. Are any of the other prints deep enough?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do I think? A mob of people b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do I think? A mob of people brought something heavy to the tree. One of them was carrying the victim. They shuffled around, especially under the tree."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "There are several footprints in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are several footprints in the mud, left by work boots: anywhere from 6 to 12 pairs have walked here.

fields.Title: You: ""No unusual horizontal bootprints,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No unusual horizontal bootprints, like the ones I saw in the Whirling's pinball workshop..."
fields.Alternate1: "No horizontal bootprints. Whoever walked in the Whirling's pinball workshop didn't walk here..."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You're not bad. It's as if the whol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're not bad. It's as if the whole world darkens, everything else has a thin film of unimportance on it -- and the tracks burn in the middle of it, in a strange, beautiful way.

fields.Title: You: ""Like the Coalition official said....."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like the Coalition official said... surreal like a *play*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm, maybe you're right and it's s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, maybe you're right and it's someone else... although I doubt it."

fields.Title: You: "Go over them one by one."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go over them one by one.

fields.Title: You: "Go over them one by one."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go over them one by one.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "7) The glowing outline of a standar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 7) The glowing outline of a standard work boot, no 46. But the imprints are *twice* as deep as the others -- the weight exceeds 200 kilograms.

fields.Title: You: ""Eight.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eight."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very well.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very well."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Two hundred?" He thinks for a mome..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Two hundred?" He thinks for a moment. "Could it be the combined weight of two people, one carrying the other who's tied up? Let's say, a heavily built worker carrying a similarly built, soon-to-be-dead man?"
fields.Alternate1: "Two hundred?" He thinks for a moment. "This could be the combined weight of two people, one carrying the other who's tied up. Let's say, a heavily built worker carrying a similarly built, armoured man? Maybe it was the fat Hardie boy, the one sitting in the middle?"
fields.Alternate2: "Two hundred?" He thinks for a moment. "This could be the combined weight of *two* people, one carrying the other. Let's say: a heavily built worker carrying a soon to be dead man who's tied up?"
fields.Alternate3: "Two hundred?" He thinks for a moment. "Could it be the combined weight of *two* people, one carrying the other? Let's say: a heavily built worker carrying a heavily built corpse -- with a bullet in his head?"

fields.Title: Drama: "It would take more subterfuge to tr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It would take more subterfuge to trick the lieutenant.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Even easier to carry on a stretche..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Even easier to carry on a stretcher -- or between two men. Anyway, it's for future consideration. What else can you see?"

fields.Title: You: "This is not how vivid I want my inn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not how vivid I want my inner life to be. I just want to get back to solving the crime now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyes narrow. He's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's eyes narrow. He's thinking to himself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. These prints are pretty standa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. These prints are pretty standard."
fields.Alternate1: "No. These prints are pretty standard -- the ones in the dust looked custom. Or maybe they're just a foreign design? It's a bootprint, whatever the case."

fields.Title: You: "And the last one?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And the last one?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "7) The glowing outline of a standar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 7) The glowing outline of a standard work boot, no 46. The imprints are *twice* as deep as the others -- the weight exceeds 200 kilograms. Fat-Angus -- carrying something?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I never got the hang of it. Hypero..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I never got the hang of it. Hyperopia." He points to his glasses. "Any of them look familiar? Are these the Hardies?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which means that the missing lady..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which means that the missing lady driver was also present at the lynching? That's it, she's the odd-sole!"

fields.Title: You: ""Not necessarily. The lady driver c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not necessarily. The lady driver could have kept the drug trade a secret."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's one pair missing from the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's one pair missing from the Union box. The eighth pair. I'm going to say it was our odd-sole."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should keep our eyes open aroun..."]
You: "Male or female?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Male or female?

fields.Title: You: "Count the rest."
fields.Dialogue Text: Count the rest.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." He looks to the holes in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm." He looks to the holes in the mud. "I counted twenty. I take it it's less than that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which ones?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which ones?"

fields.Title: You: ""None of them.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "None of them."

fields.Title: You: "Let it be."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it be.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe the carrier wanted to impres..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe the carrier wanted to impress their peers with a display of physical might?"
fields.Alternate1: "Could he have been showing off? Maybe the carrier wanted to impress his peers?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm just saying random things whil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm just saying random things while looking at holes in the mud, I have no idea where any of this is coming from."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know why I said that. We'r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know why I said that. We're not looking for a drummer, we're looking for a group of dockworkers."

fields.Title: You: ""Unless they were a machine worker,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unless they were a machine worker, or a drummer I guess."

fields.Title: You: ""Interesting. If only I had come up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interesting. If only I had come up with that idea."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "1) Standard work boot, steel reinfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 1) Standard work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 46. Just like Titus was wearing in his booth. This is the big dick -- Titus Hardie. The one with the ball cap on his head.

fields.Title: You: ""She's also the one running the dru..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's also the one running the drug trade... Interesting."

fields.Title: You: ""Four hundred million.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four hundred million."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was pretty off then. I counted 2..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""A drummer only uses their right fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A drummer only uses their right foot for the kick drum..." He explains, then stops and looks at the hole in the mud. "You're right, it's stupid."

fields.Title: Volition: "Isn't it strange when all your assu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Isn't it strange when all your assumptions are confirmed like this? Stood in a semicircle, hung him, carried him over... like you're supposed to be feeling clever. And content.

fields.Title: You: "Say: "Everything fits. We should ce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say: "Everything fits. We should celebrate by getting absolutely *UNDER THE HAMMER* in this yard."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Live a little! Everything on the go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Live a little! Everything on the god damn crime scene fits like a glove, you should get *SHITFACED* on this *GOD DAMN CRIME SCENE*!

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Eight pairs of boots have shuffled..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Eight pairs of boots have shuffled back and forth in the mud.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""By these tracks, yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "By these tracks, yes."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "6) Light as air. Same make of boot,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 6) Light as air. Same make of boot, but no 41. Small like a rat? Shanky!

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Check out the big brains on Harry W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check out the big brains on Harry Whatever-Your-Last-Name-Is!

fields.Title: You: ""This would fit what Joyce told us,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This would fit what Joyce told us, but I don't want to make any assumptions."

fields.Title: You: "(Point.) "A heavy one. Two hundred..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point.) "A heavy one. Two hundred kilogram imprint."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An obese person is becoming less l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An obese person is becoming less likely."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm. I think we have arrived at a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm. I think we have arrived at a conclusion here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Understood. Anything else?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood. Anything else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So maybe one of them wasn't a dock..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So maybe one of them wasn't a dockworker but a *driver*?" His eyes narrow. "That traffic jam in front of the harbour gates -- I wonder if it's lasted as long as the strike?"

fields.Title: You: ""Case solved.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Case solved."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "It is not impossible."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is not impossible.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Correct again. Sub-zero temperature..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Correct again. Sub-zero temperatures would preserve the tracks in a good state. The commotion here *could* have taken place a week ago.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right. Let's keep a low pro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. Let's keep a low profile." The lieutenant writes something down in his notebook, then reverts to the tracks in the mud.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Better late than never, detective...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Better late than never, detective. The whole world is dark and the tracks burn in it with strange beauty.

fields.Title: You: ""There's no denying it. Ruby really..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's no denying it. Ruby really is running a *complex operation* out of her lorry."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He doesn't seem to hear you, lookin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't seem to hear you, looking south toward the traffic jam instead. The machines are silent, the engines are all turned off...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Check out the big brains on Harrier..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check out the big brains on Harrier Du Bois!

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Of course, there were eight tracks!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, there were eight tracks! But there are only *seven* Hardie boys.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You don't know. It's a miracle you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't know. It's a miracle you can tell the prints apart as it is. The cold must have preserved them.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "8) And yet another standard work bo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 8) And yet another standard work boot, no 44. There's an aberration in the pattern of the sole, however. The right sole is smoother, more worn.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How many?" The lieutenant has been..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How many?" The lieutenant has been tracking your eyes' movements.

fields.Title: You: "(Point.) "Light step. Number 41 sho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point.) "Light step. Number 41 shoe."

fields.Title: You: "(Point.) "An aberration. One sole i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point.) "An aberration. One sole is smoother than the other."

fields.Title: You: ""One of them was carrying him over.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "One of them was carrying him over."
fields.Alternate1: "You're right, the fat guy from the booth was carrying the victim."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't see any prints fitting the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't see any prints fitting the armoured boots the victim was wearing, can you? Someone had to carry him. Are any of the *other* prints deep enough?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, they could have used a makesh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, they could have used a makeshift stretcher or just marched him up to the gallows."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone operating a work bench --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone operating a work bench -- with a pedal? Like a joiner at the harbour?" He thinks for a second. "Or maybe a drummer..."

fields.Title: You: ""We should withhold being content.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should withhold being content."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. We should have another look a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. We should have another look at the tracks."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Note to self: this would be a good..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Note to self: this would be a good question to ask Titus -- where's the eighth man?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Probably yes. This would also fit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably yes. This would also fit with the victim being dead from a previous gunshot wound. They had to carry him, because he could no longer walk."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Exactly. They had to perform it to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Exactly. They had to perform it to whoever was looking -- the whole neighbourhood, I suppose." He adds: "And us too."

fields.Title: You: ""Eight, actually.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eight, actually."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: ""The same guys are going back and f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The same guys are going back and forth."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Jump to: [Visual Calculus: "There are eight pairs of tracks in..."]
You: ""A *driver* would wear down their r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A *driver* would wear down their right shoe before the left -- the accelerator is on the right."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes... a drummer. I don't know abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes... a drummer. I don't know about a drummer. Seems tangential. However."

fields.Title: You: ""How do you know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you know?"

fields.Title: You: "I like how vivid my interior is, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I like how vivid my interior is, but could we maybe do something that doesn't involve getting drunk?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," he clears his throat. "O..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," he clears his throat. "Our assumptions could be wrong. Better not to have them confirmed just yet. Do you see anything else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhm..." His face is one of disbeli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm..." His face is one of disbelief. The words coming out of your mouth are filled with such sincerity.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it was naive of me to congrat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, it was naive of me to congratulate us. Assumptions are dangerous." He looks around. "Do you see anything else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "His eyebrows arch. They are the liv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His eyebrows arch. They are the liveliest part of his otherwise quite inexpressive face:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A morbidly obese 250 kilogram man?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A morbidly obese 250 kilogram man? Let's say it is a very *low* probability. I'm thinking..." He looks around. "Maybe there's a more *commonplace* explanation."

fields.Title: Logic: "Oh, this one's easy. Way too easy...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, this one's easy. Way too easy. It's a driver.

fields.Title: You: ""This seems *really* important. Tra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This seems *really* important. Tracks on the scene. And I can't read them at all, lieutenant!"

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper to yourself) "Why is this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper to yourself) "Why is this so complicated? I keep failing..."

fields.Title: You: ""Way off. *Waaaaaay*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Way off. *Waaaaaay*."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know..." The lieutenant sq..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know..." The lieutenant squints, trying to assess their depth: "Are you sure? I could swear you're *lying* to me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. How do you know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. How do you know?"

fields.Title: You: "I have a name and it's god damn Rap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I have a name and it's god damn Raphaël, how many times do I have to say it?!

fields.Title: You: "I'll find a way to get drunk on thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'll find a way to get drunk on this scene, I swear to god I will.

fields.Title: Volition: "I have no idea what's going on here..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I have no idea what's going on here, but you should not do anything that the horrific necktie tells you to do.

fields.Title: You: ""No. Everything fits *too* well.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. Everything fits *too* well."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm. If it fits too well, we might..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm. If it fits too well, we might be missing something. What do you see?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm."

fields.Title: You: ""So. Our Odd Sole wasn't in the bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So. Our Odd Sole wasn't in the back of the Whirling?"

fields.Title: You: ""You mean the rat-faced one?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean the rat-faced one?"

fields.Title: You: ""We've been purposefully mislead?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've been purposefully mislead?"

fields.Title: You: "I'm pretty good at this, ain't I?"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm pretty good at this, ain't I?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seven sets of tracks, right?" The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seven sets of tracks, right?" The lieutenant has been tracking your eyes' movements. "The Hardie boys were here..."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: "Let him have his moment of joy."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him have his moment of joy.

fields.Title: You: ""So, the odd-sole was present at th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, the odd-sole was present at the lynching, but isn't in the mess hall right now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He corrects his glasses. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He corrects his glasses. "I doubt the Hardies are going to tell us much, but we should still confront them about the possible drug trade connection."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He corrects his glasses. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He corrects his glasses. "I doubt the Hardies are going to tell us who this person is. For now it's best if we just keep our eyes open -- I'm sure our investigation will eventually lead us to the odd-sole."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "1) Standard work boot, steel reinfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 1) Standard work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 46.

fields.Title: You: "Point at random prints."
fields.Dialogue Text: Point at random prints.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it *wasn't*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it *wasn't*?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is real, palpable excitement..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is real, palpable excitement in his voice -- at the prospect of it *not* being a giant.

fields.Title: You: ""You're thinking: *why* did they ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're thinking: *why* did they have to carry him?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "There are eight pairs of tracks in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are eight pairs of tracks in the mud. Three stick out.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it would seem we are -- both..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, it would seem we are -- both -- from the police."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I pulled last week's forecast for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I pulled last week's forecast for coastal Revachol. Seven days below freezing. The day before -- the day of his hanging -- was the last warm day."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then after hoisting him up, they s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then after hoisting him up, they stood in a semicircle facing his direction. At first glance, this appears to be a lynching."

fields.Title: Volition: "That's not going to happen, I'm not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's not going to happen, I'm not letting him make it into one of his tasks. Know your limits, tie-creature!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks around, tracin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks around, tracing your eyes on the tracks.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As I said, I pulled last week's fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As I said, I pulled last week's forecast for coastal Revachol. Seven days below freezing. The day before his hanging was the last warm day."

fields.Title: You: "Interesting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Interesting.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't beat yourself down -- neithe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't beat yourself down -- neither can I. We'll have another look later."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe the victim refused to walk t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe the victim refused to walk to his own lynching."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You have a point there." He clicks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have a point there." He clicks his pen, thinking for a moment. "Anyway, it's something to consider. What else can you see?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Maybe more than 12? No. Eight pairs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe more than 12? No. Eight pairs of boots have shuffled back and forth in the mud.
fields.Alternate1: Eight pairs of boots have shuffled back and forth in the mud. Where else have we seen a gang of men in work boots? That's right, the Hardie boys in the mess hall of Whirling-in-Rags.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "4) Standard work boot, no 45 or 46?"
fields.Dialogue Text: 4) Standard work boot, no 45 or 46?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "5) Another standard work boot, stee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 5) Another standard work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 44.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I never got the hang of it. Hypero..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I never got the hang of it. Hyperopia." He points to his glasses. "Do you see anything out of the ordinary?"

fields.Title: You: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not assuming it isn't. But it'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not assuming it isn't. But it's still helpful -- is there anything else?"

fields.Title: You: ""Could be a woman?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could be a woman?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "He regrets it the moment he says it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He regrets it the moment he says it.

fields.Title: You: ""So one of the people we are lookin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So one of the people we are looking for is a drummer?"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "The joy dissipates down your spinal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The joy dissipates down your spinal column like a grounding effect. Glorious intellect at work!

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think happened here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think happened here?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He might be right. Two hundred kilo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He might be right. Two hundred kilograms of living weight *is* unlikely.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is saying something,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is saying something, but you can't hear it... Suddenly it seems like your tie is alive again, whispering -- no, *screaming* -- into your ear:

fields.Title: Empathy: "A doubt perhaps? It would be unprof..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A doubt perhaps? It would be unprofessional of him to be sure of himself at such an early stage of the investigation.

fields.Title: Authority: "A leader like Titus doesn't let one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A leader like Titus doesn't let one of his guys out of sight easily -- especially at a time like this.

fields.Title: You: ""Probably not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably not."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "5) Another standard work boot, rein..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 5) Another standard work boot, reinforced toes, no 44. Same as before -- either the musician Eugene, or the muscle-bound blond Glen.

fields.Title: You: ""Women..." (Shake your head.) "Alwa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Women..." (Shake your head.) "Always *deceitful*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should start with Titus Hardie,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should start with Titus Hardie, see what he's got to say on the matter -- this might throw them off, work in our advantage..." He writes something down into his little notebook. "So, what else?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Maybe you keep failing because you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe you keep failing because you *suck*?

fields.Title: You: ""I know. Eight tracks, seven Hardie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know. Eight tracks, seven Hardie boys."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not."

fields.Title: Logic: "You can almost *feel* the associati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can almost *feel* the association taking form in your frontal lobe:

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know."

fields.Title: You: ""I just blew this shit right open.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just blew this shit right open."

fields.Title: You: ""Behold my brain the golden throne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Behold my brain the golden throne of my consciousness. In here I am seated. Shackled. From here I police the land."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""From here, the boots the victim we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "From here, the boots the victim wears..." The lieutenant stops mid sentence. A sudden change in wind direction blows the stench of rotting meat right in your face. He tries to continue...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wind keeps changing... are any of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wind keeps changing... are any of the prints deep enough in your opinion?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you curious..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at you curiously. A beat passes in silence, the wind blowing, the cargo belt squeaking.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you think there's something we'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think there's something we're missing?"

fields.Title: You: "I should have gotten this earlier."
fields.Dialogue Text: I should have gotten this earlier.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Check out the big brains on Harry D..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check out the big brains on Harry Du Bois!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps it could be a *driver?*" H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps it could be a *driver?*" He raises his index finger. "A driver would wear out their right shoe before the left. The accelerator is on the right."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "3) Hobnailed work boot, steel reinf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 3) Hobnailed work boot, steel reinforced toes, no 43. The inked banger perhaps?

fields.Title: You: "What else?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What else?

fields.Title: You: "Continue counting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Continue counting.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now we know who's the missing eigh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now we know who's the missing eighth person at the lynching. Do you think that Hardie and his boys could also be involved in the drug operation?"
fields.Alternate1: "This looks like proof the missing eighth person at the lynching was Ruby... Do you think that Hardie and his 'boys' could also be involved in the drug operation?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's not going to let you steal his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not going to let you steal his thunder twice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He corrects his glasses. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He corrects his glasses. "I doubt the Hardies are going to tell us much, but we should still confront them about the possible drug trade connection."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "What, *WITHHOLD BEING CONTENT*?! Wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What, *WITHHOLD BEING CONTENT*?! What are you, mild to moderately disabled? That doesn't feel like something you should do.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, which is it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, which is it?

fields.Title: You: ""It could have been an extremely ob..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It could have been an extremely obese person."
fields.Alternate1: "It could have been one extremely obese person."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's a tree. I think we're close..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a tree. I think we're close to a conclusion here."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, it probably wasn't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, it probably wasn't."

fields.Title: You: ""A drummer? That's stupid.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A drummer? That's stupid."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do you see?" The lieutenant c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you see?" The lieutenant cleans his glasses, squinting at the shapes in the mud.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Indeed, they all stood in a row her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Indeed, they all stood in a row here and looked at the tree.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is that so? Well, okay I guess. If..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that so? Well, okay I guess. If it helps with the police-work, by all means. Do you see anything else?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Isn't this something an industrial..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Isn't this something an industrial worker would wear?

fields.Title: You: "Get an exact count."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get an exact count.
fields.tooltip2: Hardies said they hanged the victim.

fields.Title: Logic: "We're liking this. The pieces fit."
fields.Dialogue Text: We're liking this. The pieces fit.

fields.Title: You: "Count the rest."
fields.Dialogue Text: Count the rest.

fields.Title: You: "Swallow it. Just go on."
fields.Dialogue Text: Swallow it. Just go on.

fields.Title: You: "Not now. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Not now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep it to yourself.

fields.Title: You: ""Could be a kid?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could be a kid?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He knows it's hard to discern sex f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He knows it's hard to discern sex from a person's gait.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you have any ideas, lieutenant?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you have any ideas, lieutenant?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A normal human being like Lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A normal human being like Lieutenant Kitsuragi here needs to pause before they know whose shoe this is. Not you. You literally *feel* the association taking shape in your *torque* bent frontal lobe.

fields.Title: You: "Don't say anything, just nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't say anything, just nod.

fields.Title: You: ""FUCK WITH US AND GET FUCKED.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "FUCK WITH US AND GET FUCKED."

fields.Title: You: ""How should we lay down the next La..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How should we lay down the next Law?"

fields.Title: You: ""How old do you think these tracks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How old do you think these tracks are?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way..." he concludes. "What..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way..." he concludes. "What else?"

fields.Title: You: "What kind of boots?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What kind of boots?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "What do you think you are, a super-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What do you think you are, a super-detective? You're hung over, these are just dents in the mud. No pattern emerges for the time being.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know..." He inspects the o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know..." He inspects the odd sole more closely. "They're about the same size. Not the same *boot*, no -- but they *could* be the same person."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She is. And now we have concrete e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She is. And now we have concrete evidence binding everything together. We should ask Titus about this."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The fat guy from the mess hall isn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fat guy from the mess hall isn't *that* obese, he's more like a farm boy -- definitely not 250 kilograms on his own. You have to admit, he's the best fit we've got."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "8) Another standard work boot, no 4..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 8) Another standard work boot, no 44. There's an aberration in the pattern of the sole. The right sole is smoother, more worn. Curious... A missing *eighth* Hardie boy.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe the victim wasn't conscious.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe the victim wasn't conscious."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think there's any way to b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think there's any way to be sure."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Check out the big brains on whateve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check out the big brains on whatever your name is!

fields.Title: You: ""We are the fucking Law.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We are the fucking Law."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not sure. We don't want to att..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure. We don't want to attract too much attention."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A week maybe? Seven days would fit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A week maybe? Seven days would fit the time frame provided to us by the caller, who reported the hanging."

fields.Title: You: "Say: "I'm experiencing a mild malfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say: "I'm experiencing a mild malfunction, lieutenant. Something to do with my tie. It'll pass, can you hold on for a moment?"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Noted." The lieutenant takes out h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Noted." The lieutenant takes out his little notebook.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right. But we should still..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. But we should still go and see what Titus Hardie has got to say on the matter -- this might throw them off, work in our advantage..." He writes something down into his little notebook. "So, what else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhm... detective?" He's staring at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm... detective?" He's staring at you as you clutch your necktie.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was pretty off then. I counted 2..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was pretty off then. I counted 20."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Silence. The lieutenant takes his g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Silence. The lieutenant takes his glasses off and cleans them.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm," he nods enthusiastically. "A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm," he nods enthusiastically. "And I was thinking it *wasn't* the Giant of Koko Nur."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mmmhm..." The thought pleases him."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mmmhm..." The thought pleases him.

fields.Title: You: ""I just do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just do."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "The lieutenant clearly appreciates..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant clearly appreciates the chance to clear up the drummer issue himself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." The lieutenant writes the in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm." The lieutenant writes the information down in his notebook, then reverts to the tracks in the mud.

fields.Title: Logic: "Yes! Everything fits so well. Carri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes! Everything fits so well. Carried him over, hoisted him up, watched him hang -- this is easy!

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant -- workers' boot tracks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant -- workers' boot tracks." (Point to them.)

fields.Title: You: ""I was actually thinking the exact..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was actually thinking the exact same thing."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Is it? They didn't even bother to c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it? They didn't even bother to change boots. Putting them on the scene is easy; maybe even *too* easy.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We've identified one of the footpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've identified one of the footprints, but there are still seven to go..." He writes something in his little blue notebook.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Understood. We should still go and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood. We should still go and see what Titus Hardie has got to say on the matter -- this might throw them off, work in our advantage..." He writes something down into his little notebook. "So, what else?"

fields.Title: Composure: "This is not a man easily toyed with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not a man easily toyed with.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I assumed you were counting.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assumed you were counting."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi does not appre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi does not appreciate you withholding case specific information.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Possibly, yes." The lieutenant mar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Possibly, yes." The lieutenant marks something down in his notebook.

fields.Title: You: ""But maybe it *was* -- just imagine..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But maybe it *was* -- just imagine it, a giant man at least two and a half meters tall."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It could have been -- but if it *w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It could have been -- but if it *wasn't*..." He waits for you to finish the sentence.

fields.Title: You: ""Our reading of these prints could..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Our reading of these prints could be wrong."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean a display of athletic abi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean a display of athletic ability meant to belittle the victim? A local champion carrying the intruder alone? I can see it. Anyway -- the others?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, you are after all, The Law. W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, you are after all, The Law. We are the law of the land."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should keep our eyes open aroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should keep our eyes open around the traffic jam, see whether anyone strikes out as a potential suspect. Seems prudent, no?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wide open," he says without a spec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wide open," he says without a speck of laughter. "The expression is *blew the shit wide open*."

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant doesn't understand w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't understand what's happening right now. You're twisting at your tie, looking sweaty even by your standards. He needs to say something.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Heavy worker's boots with reinforce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Heavy worker's boots with reinforced toes and hobnails. All over the yard.

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant doesn't understand w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't understand what's happening right now. You're twisting at your tie, looking sweaty even by your standards. He needs to say something.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "OH YEAH BABY! FUCK THIS PLACE UP!"
fields.Dialogue Text: OH YEAH BABY! FUCK THIS PLACE UP!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do." The lieutenant marks someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do." The lieutenant marks something in his notebook. "The fat guy, I think I heard them call him Angus -- most likely to have carried the victim over."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That so? Interesting. Then one of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That so? Interesting. Then one of them seems to be missing. Anything else out of the ordinary?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhmh. Which one is missing do you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhmh. Which one is missing do you think?" He quickly adds: "I'm going to say it was our odd-sole."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Maybe there was a physically impres..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe there was a physically impressive strongman in their midst. Someone who wanted to impress their peers.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's okay," he nods, "go on.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's okay," he nods, "go on."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's not. Forget I said it, we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's not. Forget I said it, we're not looking for a drummer."

fields.Title: You: ""My god... what was that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "My god... what was that?"

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "SHUT UP, FUCK-MIDGET!"
fields.Dialogue Text: SHUT UP, FUCK-MIDGET!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It still doesn't rule Ruby out. Pe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It still doesn't rule Ruby out. People change shoes, after all. But this isn't an argument for her guilt either."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But we *know* the victim had a bul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But we *know* the victim had a bullet in his head. A more precise way to put it is: it was *made* to look like a lynching."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "...you won't get far without the li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...you won't get far without the lieutenant here to bounce thoughts off of -- where could he be right now? The asphalt passing underneath the front wheels of his motor carriage at a high speed...

fields.Title: You: "Nod thoughtfully."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nod thoughtfully.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm guessing that's the skinny Har..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm guessing that's the skinny Hardie boy, the one with his front teeth missing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""With a piece of sandpaper glued to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With a piece of sandpaper glued to the throttle..." The lieutenant adjusts his glasses as his eyes light up with excitement.

fields.Title: You: ""First the drug smuggling, now this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First the drug smuggling, now this... How deep does this rabbit hole go?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "What else is there to do?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What else is there to do?
